pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 16, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

New York, New York

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver the commencement address to New York University graduates.

Yankee Stadium

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Address by the Prime Minister at 11:36 a.m.
    • Media are asked to arrive at Gate #4 no later than 9 a.m.
    • The event will take place outdoors rain or shine. Please dress accordingly.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an investment roundtable.

BlackRock Park Avenue Plaza
55 East 52nd Street
7th floor

Note for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

4 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Chief Executive Officer of Honeywell, Darius Adamczyk.

Gallery 1
Ground floor
Grand Hyatt New York
109 E 42nd Street

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of AppNexus, Michael Rubenstein.

Gallery 1

    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 4:15 p.m.
